pull.title: Ultraprune bugfixes
pull.body: Thanks to @TheBlueMatt's PullTester and @mikehearn for spotting some of these.

events.body: I inserted a trigger case for this bug in testnet, confirmed that it failed, and then confirmed that this pull doesn't fail. The code also looks fine to me. ACK.

events.message: Bugfix: off-by-one error in coinbase maturity check

Added some comments

Some clarifications after a code review by Mike Hearn.
